words.defineEn: to support a particular person, group, or idea in a dispute or conflict
words.defineVi: để hỗ trợ một người cụ thể, nhóm, hoặc ý tưởng trong một tranh chấp hoặc xung đột

words.defineEn: used to show that one understands or agrees with what is being said because one has already experienced it
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ ra rằng một người hiểu hoặc đồng ý với những gì đang được nói bởi vì một người đã trải qua nó

examples: We need to TALK about this in TERMS like Violence Prevention.
For Calvin Pierce, it has come to many years to come to TERMS with his upbringing.
I would have been able to put it in those TERMS, but that's essentially
The danger now is that so many people feel more comfortable speaking in RACIST terms who otherwise used to be under the ROCKS in the CREVICES.
words.defineEn: the conditions included in a contract or agreement
words.defineVi: các điều kiện bao gồm trong một hợp đồng hoặc thỏa thuận

words.defineEn: used to show agreement with someone or state that what applies to the speaker also applies to one
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hiển thị sự đồng ý với ai đó hoặc tuyên bố rằng những gì áp dụng cho người nói cũng áp dụng cho một

words.defineEn: an agreement in which two companies become business partners
words.defineVi: một thỏa thuận trong đó hai công ty trở thành đối tác kinh doanh

examples: Together, the ant colony was greater than the sum of its parts.
They play the guitar together during jam sessions.
The family took a vacation together, creating wonderful memories with their children.
They did everything together.
They stayed together for the sake of the children.
words.defineEn: in agreement
words.defineVi: trong thỏa thuận

examples: What does tolerance mean?
That tolerance aspect is especially important.
For this example, a tolerance of 45 worked best.
For this example, a tolerance of 45 worked best.
There's no tolerance.
words.defineEn: willingness to accept behavior or opinions that are against one's own
words.defineVi: sẵn sàng chấp nhận hành vi hoặc ý kiến chống lại chính mình

examples: Some people ain't tolerant for it.
That’s not especially tolerant.
The Mongols were almost unprecedentedly tolerant of different religions.
But the wasps aren’t as tolerant of ethanol as fruit flies.
And philosopher and author Moses Mendelssohn used the more tolerant atmosphere to express his optimism about the future of Jews in Europe.
words.defineEn: showing respect to what other people say or do even when one disagrees with them
words.defineVi: thể hiện sự tôn trọng với những gì người khác nói hoặc làm ngay cả khi một người không đồng ý với họ

words.defineEn: in a way that shows tolerance
words.defineVi: theo cách thể hiện sự khoan dung

examples: Toleration was an Enlightenment ideal that also served to increase the number of useful citizens in an empire.
In addition to the sulh-i kul, Akbar built his reputation for toleration by sponsoring discussions of religion and philosophy.

He also wrote an opera about the Aztec emperor Monteczuma, 4. which praised Monteczuma for religious toleration 5. and seemed to agree with Enlightenment activists who fought against religious bigotry and torture.
That toleration drew Jewish people from Spanish and other intolerant regimes eastward into the kingdom.

And then we have Aurangzeb was a devout Muslim and did try to introduce Islamic principles into Mughal rule, but the trend towards orthodoxy and away from Akbar’s toleration had begun long before with his predecessor, Shah Jahan.
words.defineEn: willingness to allow something that one does not like or agree with to happen or exist
words.defineVi: sẵn sàng cho phép một cái gì đó mà một người không thích hoặc đồng ý xảy ra hoặc tồn tại

examples: The peace treaty that ended the war.
With the signing of the treaty, a powerful new European alliance first saw the light of day.
So an entire industry, the salmon industry in America, depends on treaties.
According to the US Department of State’s website, the treaty had a very colonial purpose in mind.
he finally accepted the treaty.
words.defineEn: an official agreement between two or more governments or states
words.defineVi: một thỏa thuận chính thức giữa hai hoặc nhiều chính phủ hoặc tiểu bang

examples: She signed a truce with China on May 4th, 1932.
Early on, leaders in all countries called a political truce on the home front.
This is a five-year truce.
Well, we'll just call that a truce
The truce was tested today when Palestinians threw rocks and Molotov cocktails at Israeli police outside Jerusalem's Al-Aqsa Mosque compound.
words.defineEn: an agreement according to which enemies or opponents stop fighting each other for a specific period of time; the period of time that such agreement lasts
words.defineVi: một thỏa thuận theo đó kẻ thù hoặc đối thủ ngừng chiến đấu với nhau trong một khoảng thời gian cụ thể; khoảng thời gian mà thỏa thuận đó kéo dài

examples: May your wildest dreams come true!
A true leader walks the talk.
The true story inspired many people around the world.
Calamity is man's true touchstone.
Her true feelings were finally out in the open.
words.defineEn: in a way that is truthful
words.defineVi: một cách trung thực

examples: Only 48 out of 50 states required unanimity to convict in criminal trials until 2018.
WILLIAM BRANGHAM: I should say, for all of the celebration today, there isn't total unanimity in the black community about this.
Despite the differences on the Palestinians, is there unanimity about how to handle the Biden administration, especially when it comes to the Iran nuclear deal?
But I don’t see, from right away, a kind of unanimity like you had.
Soldiers and civilians, responding with a unanimity that amazed a world that had heard much and knew little of them, rose to repel and harry the invaders.
words.defineEn: a situation in which all those involved are in complete agreement on something
words.defineVi: một tình huống trong đó tất cả những người liên quan đều hoàn toàn đồng ý về một cái gì đó

examples: It wasn't unanimous.
But that would take unanimous consent.
But today's unanimous decision does not address whether that includes salaries for athletes.
There was not a unanimous consent we should do that plan.
The New York Tribune reported, "The unanimous sentiment of the North is indignant resistance."
words.defineEn: (of a group) fully in agreement on something
words.defineVi: (của một nhóm) hoàn toàn đồng ý về một cái gì đó

words.defineEn: unlikely to cause an argument
words.defineVi: không có khả năng gây ra một cuộc tranh luận

examples: The uncontested patriarch of the household, Monet was closely tracked by his family, who would try to guess at whether he was in a good mood or not.
The election was uncontested and George Washington won.

And Putin, who had been, through his first two terms, a leader of no alternative, a leader whose power was unchallenged and uncontested, and also the trend itself, from 80 to 60, the trend is unmistakable decline.
words.defineEn: with no argument or opposition
words.defineVi: không có tranh luận hay phản đối

examples: His appointment to the D.C. Circuit I think was relatively uncontroversial.
And the craziest part of this controversial stance is how uncontroversial it all really is in the automotive industry.
words.defineEn: not causing or unlikely to cause disagreement
words.defineVi: không gây ra hoặc không có khả năng gây ra sự bất đồng

examples: She understands the importance of good design.
I fully understand the reason for your decision.
Do you understand the instructions?
I understand his feelings up to a point.
Nobody understands me.
words.defineEn: to assume something to be the case because it is obvious
words.defineVi: để giả định một cái gì đó là trường hợp bởi vì nó là rõ ràng

examples: The audience nodded in understanding as the speaker explained the concept.
The experienced lawyer is streets ahead of her young colleagues, with a deep understanding of the law and years of courtroom experience.
The scientist presented an abstract theory that revolutionized our understanding of the universe.
The discovery of new planets represents a quantum leap in astronomy, with the potential to deepen our understanding of the universe and our place in it.
The student's answer to the question was wide off the mark and showed a lack of understanding of the topic.
words.defineEn: an informal agreement that may be unspoken
words.defineVi: một thỏa thuận không chính thức có thể không được nói ra

examples: When supplies ran low during the mountaineering expedition, the climbers realized that hunger breaks stone walls and undertook increasingly dangerous descents to forage for food.
The company undertook an initial public offering in 2018 at a float price just above 24 dollars.
In time, these enterprising fish would undertake one of the most important journeys in the history of life.
At Parker, they undertook the irrigation of fertile desert lands.
So it undertook an unusual effort called quantitative easing, or QE.
words.defineEn: to accept or promise to do something particular
words.defineVi: để chấp nhận hoặc hứa sẽ làm một cái gì đó cụ thể

examples: I know writing a book is a huge undertaking, but as the proverb goes, a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step, so I'm going to start by writing just one page a day.
Remember, huge undertaking.
By any standard, it is a massive undertaking.
It was a monstrous undertaking with a number of National Park Service, engineers, and architects.
But this is a massive undertaking we are taking as a world.
words.defineEn: a formal promise to do something particular
words.defineVi: một lời hứa chính thức để làm một cái gì đó cụ thể

examples: United won four games in a row.
The team managed to stay united and determined during the dog days of the project, despite facing numerous setbacks and obstacles.
The members of the team knew that they had to work together and support each other if they wanted to win the championship, because they understood the truth of united we stand, divided we fall.
Republicans are pretty united in their dislike of the president.
Two years later, American and United followed suit with their own basic economy products.
words.defineEn: (of groups or people) acting together and in agreement
words.defineVi: (của nhóm hoặc người) hành động cùng nhau và trong thỏa thuận

examples: All pretence at unity went out of the window as cabinet colleagues traded insults.
The coach told the team that unity is strength and that they needed to work together if they wanted to win the game.
Unity is certainly not alone.
The young nations were often ethnically heterogeneous and lacked unity.
There's unity in Chelsea.
words.defineEn: a situation in which those involved are in agreement or joined together
words.defineVi: một tình huống trong đó những người liên quan đồng ý hoặc tham gia cùng nhau

examples: And it’s that unspoken taboo around the topic of money that allows this negative feedback loop to continue.
Young humans also need to learn the unspoken rules of human society and develop an understanding of things like emotion, language, and cooperation.
She didn't tell me that, but it's probably the unspoken truth.

I was recently on the phone with an internet service provider whose name shall remain unspoken because they promised me their mediocre internet services for one price and then charged me another price .
But now there's this delicate and unspoken dance between black Americans who have been here since 16 19, and the black Americans who have been here more recently, like me since the seventies.
words.defineEn: not put into words; understood or agreed without being put into words
words.defineVi: không nói thành lời; hiểu hoặc đồng ý mà không được đưa vào lời nói

words.defineEn: not put into words; agreed or understood without being expressed in speech
words.defineVi: không nói thành lời; đồng ý hoặc hiểu mà không được thể hiện trong bài phát biểu

examples: If you liked this video, subscribe, like us, Upvote us on Reddit.
You buy fake reviews to distinguish yourself, fake ratings, fake upvotes.

From Facebook groups where bad actors solicit paid positive reviews to bots and click farms that upvote negative reviews to take out the competition, fake reviews have boosted sales of unsafe products, caused huge brands to sever ties with Amazon and hurt business for legitimate sellers.
words.defineEn: to show one's agreement or approval of an online post or comment by clicking on a specific icon
words.defineVi: để thể hiện sự đồng ý hoặc phê duyệt của một bài đăng hoặc nhận xét trực tuyến bằng cách nhấp vào một biểu tượng cụ thể

examples: If you liked this video, subscribe, like us, Upvote us on Reddit.
You buy fake reviews to distinguish yourself, fake ratings, fake upvotes.

From Facebook groups where bad actors solicit paid positive reviews to bots and click farms that upvote negative reviews to take out the competition, fake reviews have boosted sales of unsafe products, caused huge brands to sever ties with Amazon and hurt business for legitimate sellers.
words.defineEn: the action of showing one's agreement or approval of an online post or comment by clicking on a specific icon
words.defineVi: hành động thể hiện sự đồng ý hoặc phê duyệt của một người đối với một bài đăng hoặc nhận xét trực tuyến bằng cách nhấp vào một biểu tượng cụ thể

examples: All builds come with a two year warranty.
All builds come with a two year warranty.
It's got a two year warranty.
We also only offered a one-year warranty at that price.
I like like the warranty.
words.defineEn: a written agreement in which a manufacturer promises a customer to repair or replace a product, under certain conditions, within a specific period of time
words.defineVi: một thỏa thuận bằng văn bản trong đó nhà sản xuất hứa với khách hàng sẽ sửa chữa hoặc thay thế sản phẩm, trong những điều kiện nhất định, trong một khoảng thời gian cụ thể

examples: The horse took the first fence well.
Generally, the article reads very well.
The car holds the corners very well.
The glue is taking well.
In this grim little episode, few people come out well.
words.defineEn: said to express agreement to something, usually reluctantly
words.defineVi: nói để bày tỏ sự đồng ý với một cái gì đó, thường là miễn cưỡng

words.defineEn: said to express admiration for or agreement with what someone has just said
words.defineVi: nói để bày tỏ sự ngưỡng mộ hoặc đồng ý với những gì ai đó vừa nói

words.defineEn: said to agree to someone's suggestion, particularly to avoid an argument
words.defineVi: nói đồng ý với đề nghị của ai đó, đặc biệt là để tránh một cuộc tranh luận

words.defineEn: to forget about past disagreements or mistakes and start fresh
words.defineVi: để quên đi những bất đồng hoặc sai lầm trong quá khứ và bắt đầu mới

words.defineEn: agreeing to something in a united and simultaneous manner
words.defineVi: đồng ý với một cái gì đó một cách thống nhất và đồng thời

words.defineEn: with everyone expressing the same opinion
words.defineVi: với tất cả mọi người bày tỏ cùng một ý kiến

words.defineEn: used to politely accept or agree to something
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để lịch sự chấp nhận hoặc đồng ý với một cái gì đó

examples: They are wrapping up their employees in cotton wool, offering extra benefits and rewards.
It's pointless to put off what can be wrapped up today until tomorrow.
The prosecution and defense wrap up their cases in the murder trial of former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin.
Today, prosecutors for the state of Minnesota wrapped up their case.
Tomorrow, the House impeachment managers wrap up their opening arguments.
words.defineEn: to conclude or complete a meeting, job, agreement, etc.
words.defineVi: để kết thúc hoặc hoàn thành một cuộc họp, công việc, thỏa thuận, vv

words.defineEn: to include a condition in an agreement or contract
words.defineVi: để bao gồm một điều kiện trong một thỏa thuận hoặc hợp đồng

examples: "Yeah, and pigs might fly."
Yeah, and pigs might fly.
Yeah, that's the spirit!
Yeah, but it rocks! ’
Ha, yeah right, and the moon is made of cheese.
words.defineEn: another way of saying 'yes'
words.defineVi: một cách khác để nói 'có'

examples: Please say yes!
Oh yes, enough said.
Yes, I'm as snug as a bug in a rug.
Yes, he is my friend.
Yes, that's a great idea!
words.defineEn: a word that shows we agree with something or think that it is true when answering a question
words.defineVi: một từ cho thấy chúng tôi đồng ý với một cái gì đó hoặc nghĩ rằng đó là sự thật khi trả lời một câu hỏi

words.defineEn: a person who always agrees with their leader or employer unquestionably in order to please them
words.defineVi: một người luôn đồng ý với người lãnh đạo hoặc chủ nhân của họ một cách không nghi ngờ gì để làm hài lòng họ

words.defineEn: used to show complete agreement or emphasize one's opinion
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hiển thị hoàn toàn đồng ý hoặc nhấn mạnh ý kiến của một người

words.defineEn: used to express one's complete agreement with someone's statement
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để bày tỏ sự đồng ý hoàn toàn của một người với tuyên bố của ai đó

examples: You said it, Conan, you're the king.
You said it, I didn't.
You said it, I didn't.
You said it, buddy. - Really wish I wouldn't have said that.
Oh, that's so much less impressive, now that you said it.

words.defineVi: nói để bày tỏ sự đồng ý với đề nghị của ai đó

words.defineEn: used to display complete agreement or awareness of something
